name: Montreux Jazz Festival Miami
description: Join us for the inaugural edition of the Montreux Jazz Festival Miami! Inspired by jazz but spreading across musical genres and origins, MJF Miami offers extraordinary artist performances in an intimate, 1500-person venue, beautiful settings and great hospitality. Performances by Jon Batiste and Friends: Cécile McLorin Salvant, Israel Houghton, Lia de Itamaracá; Daniela Mercury; Daryl Hall; The Wailers; Cimafunk; Cory Henry; Emily Estefan; ELEW; Justin Kauflin; Adrian Cota & the Winston House Band; Mathis Picard, followed each night by the Legendary Montreux Jazz Jam Sessions.See over 15 performances during the 3 days or join us for the night of your choice. On March 1st, Jon Batiste will perform and curate the entire inaugural evening's programming including special guests, emerging artists and participants in the Legendary Montreux Jam Session. On March 2nd, Daniela Mercury, the dynamic Queen of Axé brings her exhilarating energy and vibrant rhythms to the stage. On March 3rd, rock and roll hall of famer Daryl Hall closes out the festival with some of his legendary songs. Festival goers will also experience sunset concerts featuring emerging artists, the Legendary Montreux Jam Session and curated dining options from some of Miami’s best restaurants. The Montreux Jazz Festival Miami is an international edition of The Montreux Jazz Festival, which takes place for two weeks every summer in Switzerland, on the shores of Lake Geneva. Montreux Jazz Festival celebrates the industry’s emerging and contemporary acts, whilst paying homage to music’s legendary acts. Originally a pure jazz festival since inception in 1967, Montreux began showcasing other styles of music throughout the decades and today presents artists from across every genre imaginable. Artists that have graced the stage of Montreux include Etta James, Quincy Jones, Bob Dylan, Elton John, Ms. Lauryn Hill, Aretha Franklin, David Bowie, James Brown, Kendrick Lamar, Leonard Cohen, Marvin Gaye, Miles Davis, Nina Simone and many more.Created in 1967 by Claude Nobs and directed by Mathieu Jaton since 2013, the Montreux Jazz Festival has become over the years an essential event, generating fantastic stories and legendary performances. Nearly 250,000 spectators come to the Festival every year, enjoying a breath-taking setting, concerts with renowned acoustics and many free stages.

name: The WhiskyX Miami 2024
description: We would like to invite you to taste, discover, and learn about more than 60 premium whiskey brands and cocktails–the best of Bourbon, American, Irish, Scotch, Rye, Single Malt, and more as part of our WhiskyX event in Miami! We’ve curated an unprecedented selection of innovative and world-class whiskies.To make it an evening you won’t soon forget, we’re serving it all up with awesome cuisine available from the best food trucks in the city, a cigar lounge, complimentary hair-and-beard trims, and more.Our VIP package includes one ticket to the big event with exclusive 6 PM entry, providing you with an extra hour of unlimited tastings before general admission begins at 7 as well as a complimentary cigar in addition to the food truck village access.  Our General Admission package includes one ticket to the event with 7 PM entry inclusive of unlimited tastings as well as the food truck village access. Since 2017, WhiskyX has been attracting record crowds of whiskey-lovers across the country–in places like Austin, Houston, Boston, Las Vegas, Nashville, Chicago, Denver, Los Angeles, and Brooklyn. Hope to see you there!

name: E11EVEN MIAMI MMW
description: MMW After Parties at E11EVEN Thursday, March 21.Miami New Times Best of Miami 2023 Winner: Best Dance Club and Best Music Venue.ENTRY:All Ticket Sales are Final.All guests must be 21+ with a valid photo ID. Ticket only guarantees entry before 1am, must arrive with entire group upon entry, and present valid photo ID along with matching credit card used at purchase.  NOTE: Guests arriving after 1am on the night of the event must pay the difference between their ticket price and the current door entertainment fee. If the purchaser will not be entering with the entire group, please contact TIXR at support.tixr.com to change the names on your PDF tickets.NON-TRANSFERABLE:Tickets are non-transferable. All ticket sales are final, and reselling of tickets is strictly prohibited. THIRD PARTY WEBSITES:Do not purchase tickets from third party websites such as Eventbrite. They will not be honored at the door, and we cannot issue a refund for tickets purchased anywhere other than Tixr.comDRESS CODE:Upscale and Stylish Nightlife attire. No oversized clothing, including but not limited to T-shirts and pants. No beachwear permitted, such as shorts, tank tops, flip-flops, baseball caps, jerseys, etc.ABOUT:E11EVEN MIAMI, AN ULTRACLUB OPEN 24 HRS WEDNESDAY TO MONDAY IS ENTERTAINMENT REIMAGINED. AN IMMERSIVE ADVENTURE, ENCOMPASSING THE LUXURY AND SOPHISTICATION OF A ONE-OF-KIND EXPERIENCE. THE AWARD-WINNING LANDMARK DESTINATION PRESENTS A SERIES OF THE MOST SPECTACULAR LIVE SHOWS EVER PERFORMED INSIDE A NIGHTCLUB. WORLD CLASS AERIALISTS, ACROBATS, CONTORTIONISTS, AND DANCERS BRING THE HIGHEST LEVEL OF CIRCUS AND PERFORMANCE ART, CHOREOGRAPHED TO ORIGINAL MUSIC AGAINST THE BACKDROP OF THE STATE-OF-THE-ART SOUND & LIGHTING TECHNOLOGY. KNOWN FOR PRESENTING UNFORGETTABLE UP-CLOSE-AND-PERSONAL LIVE PERFORMANCES AND APPEARANCES BY SOME OF THE BIGGEST NAMES IN THE MUSIC INDUSTRY SUCH AS DRAKE, MILEY CYRUS, USHER, NICKY JAM, THE CHAINSMOKERS, NICKI MINAJ, LEO DICAPRIO AND STING. OFFERING PREMIUM BOTTLE SERVICE AND A DELECTABLE FOOD MENU ALL PROVIDED IN AN ALLURING ENVIRONMENT THAT IS BOTH SEXY AS IT IS SOPHISTICATED, IT’S TRULY A FIVE-STAR HOSPITALITY NIGHTLIFE EXPERIENCE LIKE NO OTHER.

name: WeRMiami Closing Rooftop Pool Party Afro Latin House (Arlo Wynwood Miami)
description: SATURDAY MARCH 24TH 2024 DAYTIME ROOFTOP POOL PARTY12pm - 10pmFULL LINE UPDAVID TORT | HECTOR ROMERO | MARKEMSIMONE VITULLO | JASK | MR. PAUERPOLYRHYTHM | RIICH MUSIC | KELILADive into WERMIAMI’s iconic upcoming Wynwood pool parties, where the legendary Miami vibes meet the Art District’s creative spirit. For over 12 years, our rooftop parties have been the epicenter of unforgettable poolside moments, featuring a 76-foot heated pool with panoramic art district views. Our handpicked lineup of world-renowned producers ensures the soundtrack to your day is nothing short of spectacular. Experience the ultimate pool party in Miami’s heart, where every splash and beat tells a story of luxury, art, and exhilarating enjoyment.

name: Miami TCG Convention
description: Join us at the Miami TCG Con Oct. 5th & 6th, 2024 at the Miami Airport Convention Center!Gen. Admission: 11am to 6pmThe Miami TCG Convention is Miami's Premier Trading Card Convention!There will be:300+ Vendor Tables with Pokemon, Magic! The Gathering, Lorcana, Funko Pop's, Comics, Art, International Snacks, Cosplay, Card Tournaments and much more!  Miami TCG Promo Cards that will be handed out to paying customers. 1 per day for General Admission. 20+ Celebrities Signing & Meet & Greets:20 + Illustrators: Individual Autographs are $40 and up. Personalized Autographs are $10 Total for these Illustrators. Maximum of 3 per turn. Unlimited turns. Disney Animator Peter Raymundo will be signing & Illustrating Lorcana cards, Funko Pops & more!Autographs for Peter Raymundo are $45 and Illustrations start at $35Don't miss out on the Celebrity Meet & Greet's, Giveaways, Trading Card Tournaments & a Cosplay Competition! Children 12 and under are free to enter and we limit 1 free child per guardian. There will be a Cosplay Competition both days & TCG Tournaments all weekend!Stay Tuned for more updates!Instagram: MIAMI TCG CON INSTAGRAM     Facebook: Miami TCG FacebookTiktok: Miami TCG Tiktok                                 X: Miami TCG Convention

name: The TequilaX Miami 2024
description: Join us for a special evening to discover, taste and learn about Mexico's finest Tequila, Mezcal and Agave spirits & cocktails. The best of Blanco, Añejo, Reposado, Extra Añejo, Joven, Mezcal and more as part of our TequilaX event in Miami! We’ve curated an unprecedented selection of innovative and world-class Tequilas.To make it an event you won’t soon forget, we will have a featured art showing of Mexico's finest new artists (meet the artist in select markets) and a music playlist curated by next generation Mexican musicians. We’re serving it all up with awesome cuisine available from our exclusive food for purchase food truck village, complimentary hair-and-beard trims, and more!Our VIP package includes one ticket to the big event with exclusive 6 PM entry, providing you with an extra hour of unlimited tastings before general admission begins at 7 PM. Our General Admission package includes one ticket to the event with 7PM entry. Both tickets include premium tequila tasting.

name: E11EVEN MIAMI
description: Miami New Times Best of Miami 2023 Winner: Best Dance Club and Best Music Venue.ENTRY:All Ticket Sales are Final.All guests must be 21+ with a valid photo ID. Ticket only guarantees entry before 1am, must arrive with entire group upon entry, and present valid photo ID along with matching credit card used at purchase.  NOTE: Guests arriving after 1am on the night of the event must pay the difference between their ticket price and the current door entertainment fee. If the purchaser will not be entering with the entire group, please contact TIXR at support.tixr.com to change the names on your PDF tickets.NON-TRANSFERABLE:Tickets are non-transferable. All ticket sales are final, and reselling of tickets is strictly prohibited. THIRD PARTY WEBSITES:Do not purchase tickets from third party websites such as Eventbrite. They will not be honored at the door, and we cannot issue a refund for tickets purchased anywhere other than Tixr.comDRESS CODE:Upscale and Stylish Nightlife attire. No oversized clothing, including but not limited to T-shirts and pants. No beachwear permitted, such as shorts, tank tops, flip-flops, baseball caps, jerseys, etc.ABOUT:E11EVEN MIAMI, AN ULTRACLUB OPEN 24 HRS WEDNESDAY TO MONDAY IS ENTERTAINMENT REIMAGINED. AN IMMERSIVE ADVENTURE, ENCOMPASSING THE LUXURY AND SOPHISTICATION OF A ONE-OF-KIND EXPERIENCE. THE AWARD-WINNING LANDMARK DESTINATION PRESENTS A SERIES OF THE MOST SPECTACULAR LIVE SHOWS EVER PERFORMED INSIDE A NIGHTCLUB. WORLD CLASS AERIALISTS, ACROBATS, CONTORTIONISTS, AND DANCERS BRING THE HIGHEST LEVEL OF CIRCUS AND PERFORMANCE ART, CHOREOGRAPHED TO ORIGINAL MUSIC AGAINST THE BACKDROP OF THE STATE-OF-THE-ART SOUND & LIGHTING TECHNOLOGY. KNOWN FOR PRESENTING UNFORGETTABLE UP-CLOSE-AND-PERSONAL LIVE PERFORMANCES AND APPEARANCES BY SOME OF THE BIGGEST NAMES IN THE MUSIC INDUSTRY SUCH AS DRAKE, MILEY CYRUS, USHER, NICKY JAM, THE CHAINSMOKERS, NICKI MINAJ, LEO DICAPRIO AND STING. OFFERING PREMIUM BOTTLE SERVICE AND A DELECTABLE FOOD MENU ALL PROVIDED IN AN ALLURING ENVIRONMENT THAT IS BOTH SEXY AS IT IS SOPHISTICATED, IT’S TRULY A FIVE-STAR HOSPITALITY NIGHTLIFE EXPERIENCE LIKE NO OTHER.

name: SweetHeat Miami 2024
description: MIAMI'S PRIDE FOR WOMENSweetHeat Miami is the ONLY experience cultivated for women of all backgrounds and identities on South Beach and the Miami area. We have been a staple of celebration, appreciation, and acceptance of each unique lived experience for our patrons turned family. And our commitment to cultivating this community of safety and love will continue to be an integral piece of our identity, here and in all of the cities across the Country we venture to next.IMPORTANT INFORMATION:WILL CALL ticket pickup. A valid government issued ID matching the purchase information along with the credit card used for the purchase will be required. NO EXCEPTIONS.All sales are final. Absolutely NO refunds or exchanges.All events are 21 and over.All events are rain or shine.Artists are subject to change, cancellation and or replacement, including on the dates of performance and scheduled talent.WRISTBANDS & TICKET INFORMATION:You will immediately receive an order confirmation e-mail.Passes WILL NOT be mailed. Weekend Passes and individual tickets will be available on your phone via email!!!Any disputes arising out of a ticket purchase online or at the event will be governed by Florida law. Wearing a wristband is a condition of attending this event. All sales are final. No refunds. No exceptions.FAQs:Q: Are there ID requirements or an age limit to enter the event?A: You must be 21+ to attend all events. Photo ID will be required at the entrance to all events.Q: What are my transport/parking options getting to the event?A: All South Beach hotels offer valet parking or you can uber/lyft to events! Renting a vehicle is suggested.Q: Where can I contact the organizer with any questions?A: info@sweetheatmiami.net | 305.878.1676Q:Is my registration/ticket refundable or can it be transferred?A: All purchases are non-refundable and cannot be transferred!

PAUERPOLYRHYTHM | RIICH MUSIC | KELILADive into WERMIAMI’s iconic upcoming Wynwood pool parties, where the legendary Miami vibes meet the Art District’s creative spirit. For over 12 years, our rooftop parties have been the epicenter of unforgettable poolside moments, featuring a 76-foot heated pool with panoramic art district views. Our handpicked lineup of world-renowned producers ensures the soundtrack to your day is nothing short of spectacular. Experience the ultimate pool party in Miami’s heart, where every splash and beat tells a story of luxury, art, and exhilarating enjoyment.

name: Montreux Jazz Festival Miami
description: Join us for the inaugural edition of the Montreux Jazz Festival Miami! Inspired by jazz but spreading across musical genres and origins, MJF Miami offers extraordinary artist performances in an intimate, 1500-person venue, beautiful settings and great hospitality. Performances by Jon Batiste and Friends: Cécile McLorin Salvant, Israel Houghton, Lia de Itamaracá; Daniela Mercury; Daryl Hall; The Wailers; Cimafunk; Cory Henry; Emily Estefan; ELEW; Justin Kauflin; Adrian Cota & the Winston House Band; Mathis Picard, followed each night by the Legendary Montreux Jazz Jam Sessions.See over 15 performances during the 3 days or join us for the night of your choice. On March 1st, Jon Batiste will perform and curate the entire inaugural evening's programming including special guests, emerging artists and participants in the Legendary Montreux Jam Session. On March 2nd, Daniela Mercury, the dynamic Queen of Axé brings her exhilarating energy and vibrant rhythms to the stage. On March 3rd, rock and roll hall of famer Daryl Hall closes out the festival with some of his legendary songs. Festival goers will also experience sunset concerts featuring emerging artists, the Legendary Montreux Jam Session and curated dining options from some of Miami’s best restaurants. The Montreux Jazz Festival Miami is an international edition of The Montreux Jazz Festival, which takes place for two weeks every summer in Switzerland, on the shores of Lake Geneva. Montreux Jazz Festival celebrates the industry’s emerging and contemporary acts, whilst paying homage to music’s legendary acts. Originally a pure jazz festival since inception in 1967, Montreux began showcasing other styles of music throughout the decades and today presents artists from across every genre imaginable. Artists that have graced the stage of Montreux include Etta James, Quincy Jones, Bob Dylan, Elton John, Ms. Lauryn Hill, Aretha Franklin, David Bowie, James Brown, Kendrick Lamar, Leonard Cohen, Marvin Gaye, Miles Davis, Nina Simone and many more.Created in 1967 by Claude Nobs and directed by Mathieu Jaton since 2013, the Montreux Jazz Festival has become over the years an essential event, generating fantastic stories and legendary performances. Nearly 250,000 spectators come to the Festival every year, enjoying a breath-taking setting, concerts with renowned acoustics and many free stages.

name: The WhiskyX Miami 2024
description: We would like to invite you to taste, discover, and learn about more than 60 premium whiskey brands and cocktails–the best of Bourbon, American, Irish, Scotch, Rye, Single Malt, and more as part of our WhiskyX event in Miami! We’ve curated an unprecedented selection of innovative and world-class whiskies.To make it an evening you won’t soon forget, we’re serving it all up with awesome cuisine available from the best food trucks in the city, a cigar lounge, complimentary hair-and-beard trims, and more.Our VIP package includes one ticket to the big event with exclusive 6 PM entry, providing you with an extra hour of unlimited tastings before general admission begins at 7 as well as a complimentary cigar in addition to the food truck village access.  Our General Admission package includes one ticket to the event with 7 PM entry inclusive of unlimited tastings as well as the food truck village access. Since 2017, WhiskyX has been attracting record crowds of whiskey-lovers across the country–in places like Austin, Houston, Boston, Las Vegas, Nashville, Chicago, Denver, Los Angeles, and Brooklyn. Hope to see you there!
